name: Full Denture, Acrylic Teeth
description: Missing teeth are replaced permanently with a titanium screw that acts as a tooth root and is embedded into the jaw bone with a crown attached.

name: Panoramic X-Rays
description: Crowns, bridges, veneers, teeth whitening, dental restorations and teeth whitening

name: Root canal (molar)
description: Root canal treatment is a procedure that involves removing the tooth root and placing a crown on the tooth. The crown is then removed and the tooth is placed back in place.

name: Orthognatic Surgery
description: Orthognatic surgery is a procedure that involves removing the tooth root and placing a crown on the tooth. The crown is then removed and the tooth is placed back in place.

name: Space maintainer
description: Space maintainer is a procedure that involves removing the tooth root and placing a crown on the tooth. The crown is then removed and the tooth is placed back in place.

name: Sinus lifting
description: Sinus lifting is a procedure that involves removing the tooth root and placing a crown on the tooth. The crown is then removed and the tooth is placed back in place.
